task_help: You are bored out of your mind. You need to go on the internet to have random conversations with strangers. Meet at least 3 new people from around the world. Remember, the internet is full of advertisements. Some are genuine, others are malicious. Don't ever click on them unless you know exactly what you are doing. You never know where they may lead you.
task_direction:

2. Type 'www.gabber.game' in the address bar to visit the required website.

3. Chat with at least 3 strangers to complete the task.
